mapper.select: select b.no, b.room_no, a.send_mno, a.read_mno, b.time, a.content, c.m1_name, c.m2_name, c.mno1_lastvisit, c.mno2_lastvisit from (select * from chat) a, (select distinct room_no, max(c.no) as no, max(c.time) as time from chat c inner join member m on (m.no = c.send_mno or m.no = c.read_mno) and m.no=#{no} group by room_no) b, (select r.no, r.room_no, r.mno1, m1.name as m1_name, r.mno2, r.mno1_lastvisit, r.mno2_lastvisit, m2.name as m2_name from room r, member m1, member m2 where r.mno1 = m1.no and r.mno2 = m2.no and (m1.no=#{no} or m2.no=#{no})) c where a.no = b.no and a.room_no = b.room_no and c.room_no = b.room_no order by time desc
mapper.insert: insert into room(no,room_no,mno1, mno2) values(0, room_seq.nextval, #{mno1}, #{mno2})
mapper.select: select * from room where mno1 = #{mno1} and mno2 = #{mno2}
mapper.update: update room set mno1_lastvisit=sysdate where room_no = #{room_no} and mno1 = #{mno1}
update room set mno2_lastvisit=sysdate where room_no = #{room_no} and mno2 = #{mno2}
